# Read Images


```{r}
library(EBImage)
library(RBioFormats)
```

```{r}
img <- read.image("data/30x_DM123_1um_beads_FOV180_ROI090.oir")
dim(img)
colorMode(img)
ch1 <- img[,,1,]
ch2 <- img[,,2,]
ch3 <- img[,,3,]

dim(ch1)
dim(ch2)
dim(ch3)

ch1max <- apply(ch1,c(1,2),max)
dim(ch1max)
```

```{r}
display(img)
```
